get_tags_stats.map: function(doc){ if(doc.categories){ for(i in doc.categories){ emit(doc.categories[i],doc._id );  }} }

get_user.map: function(doc){ if(doc.type=='user'){ for(var prop in doc){  if(prop=='_id') { emit(['id',doc[prop]],doc);} emit([prop,doc[prop]],doc); }  } }

get_bookmarks_by_field.map: function(doc){ if(doc.bAddress){ for(var prop in doc){  if(prop=='_id') { emit(['id',doc[prop]],doc);} emit([prop,doc[prop]],doc); }  } }
